channel.title: It always says this when i try to log on any server
channel.description:
ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER. MUST BE DOWN. CLICK "CANCEL" THEN TO "START SERVER" TO MAKE YOUR OWN.
sometimes it actually works...but everytime i try to use this dam thing it always says that.

item.title: It always says this when i try to log on any server
item.dc:creator: @Zarzoon Zarzoon
item.description:
@Zarzoon wrote:

well what server would u suggest to use…thats like the best and this thing doesnt occur alot?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 20, 2007, 06:36:46 PM[/size][hr]Omfg, i’ve tried every single on of those gay servers…and eversingle one did that…wtf is everysingle one offline?

Read full topic

item.title: It always says this when i try to log on any server

item.description:

That means the server is down. (Offline) If that’s the case, just try another.
